articles.title: Fil-Am Olivia Rodrigo leads all nominees at 2021 American Music Awards - Philstar.com
articles.description: Rodrigo is up for Artist of the Year, New Artist of the Year, and Favorite Female Pop Artist.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines — Teenage Filipino-American singer Olivia Rodrigo scored the most nominations at this year's American Music Awards with seven due to her debut album "SOUR."
